mapper.select: SELECT investment.hw_id, investment.hw_status, investment.hw_reg_date, product.hw_product_name, product.hw_product_status, product.picture_url, product.total_budget_fil, product.token, user.user_name, user.user_email, investment.hw_invest_fil, investment.user_id, investment.hw_product_id FROM nanodc.hw_investment AS investment INNER JOIN nanodc.hw_product AS product ON investment.hw_product_id = product.hw_product_id INNER JOIN nanodc.user_info AS user ON investment.user_id = user.user_id WHERE investment.hw_status='active' AND user.user_status='active' ORDER BY investment.hw_reg_date DESC;
